pages.text:
Request Your Reservation
Call Our Office Today - (850) 995-5898
Email:
[email protected]
Please note that filling out and submitting this form is only a request for a reservation. Submitting this form does not guarantee your reservation. Once received, we will contact you to complete and confirm your request. We do not guarantee specific sites. Please refer to Park’s Rates and Park’s Information Pages for more information.
By submitting this form I acknowledge and agree that I and my guests staying with me will abide by all the rules and regulations of Avalon Landing RV Park, which may be found online at
HERE
. I further understand and agree with the terms of the cancellation policies.
Sorry, we do not allow tent camping or sleeping in cars at our Park.
Featured Testimonials
Very nice evening park canoe rentals. Cable and wifi (wifi was the greatest strength wise but cable made up for it? little more expensive than what I'm used to but it is a very nice park and will stay again. Great place of catching crab
ANDREW BRIDGER
We love living here. Great people, great views, so in Love!!!
CHRISTIE WALTON
Stopped there last year in March on the way to the 12 Hours of Sebring races and am stopping there again tomorrow. Nice clean park with nice views. Wendy does a great job at the desk.
KEN BIRD
Get Directions
Cancellation Policy:
Notice Required
Required or Loss Deposit
Daily:
1 Week
1 Day Charge
Weekly:
1 Week
2 Day Charge
Monthly:
2 Month
Notice required or lose deposit – $200.00 charge
Reservations for more than a 10 day stay or over a Holiday stay
require a 1 to 2 month cancellation notice.
All rates are subject to change without notice.
